text: Novobzhegokay () is a rural locality (an aul) in Enemskoye Urban Settlement of Takhtamukaysky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 381 as of 2018. There are 5 streets. == Geography == The aul located on the right bank of the Afipse River, 5 km west from Enem. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Adyghes. == References == Category:Rural localities in Takhtamukaysky District
title: Novobzhegokay
